column1: Nutritional values per ½ Deluxe Tub

> 🌿 **Vegan & Dairy-free**
Recipe is using only fruit and no dairy. Process on *Sorbet*, [hold it shortly under running water](https://jhermann.github.io/ice-creamery/info/tips%2Btricks/#handling-of-icy-sides-bottom) *after* that. Then a scrape-down and a respin. Rating: 😋🍓 (untested)
> 💡 If you can get ahold of it, mulled wine from berries (Bär Gløgg) is a great alternative to the red wine.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.

column13: also works with rosé or white wine
